QuestData.Title: Shakedown at the Saldean's
QuestData.Description: So what do we know so far? We need to follow the clues.$B$BOver at the Jansen Stead you found a water-soaked letter and some scraps of red cloth. Here at the Furlbrow's you overheard a conversation between some shadowy figure and an ogre mage. You also got a confession to the murder from a bunch of thugs - whom you then killed.$B$BSomething isn't adding up, rookie.$B$BThere's an old couple, southeast of here, at the Saldean's Farm. Head over there and speak with Farmer Saldean. Find out what he knows.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Farmer Saldean at Saldean's Farm in Westfall.
QuestData.RewardText: Horatio Laine? That man is a scumbag. Dirty as my underwear.$B$BListen, friend, I don't often give out advice like this, but you seem like a good $g man:woman;. GET OUT OF WESTFALL. You're already in way over your head. All you're doing now is putting your neck on the chopping block.
